item.title: Log API Payload in istio
item.description: Overview API Payload capture is a key tool in troubleshooting. tcpdump is the tool working at ISO layer 3~6, Our api working working at Layer 7(HTTP), many capture rules are work only on Layer 7. E.g. filter payload by URL Path is hard. tcpdump -i enp0s8 -s 0 -v -n -l | egrep -i "POST /|GET /|Host:" In Istio(ADP Service Mesh), Envoy is the sidecar. It supports HTTP Filters, It work on Layer 7, We can create some filter on Envoy to capture payload.
